summary: This mod changes the name "gold" of the coins to "Septim", and add some (little) weight to it !
descriptionHtml:
This mod changes the name "gold" of the coins to "Septim", and add some (little) weight to it ! Now the septims have a 0.01 weight, which adds some kind of immersion (transporting 25,000 gold isn't very realistic, hey ?)
To install this mod, just add the .esp file in your Data folder and activate it from your game launcher.
author: MrAndersOn
